name: Prince Xizor
Lore: 'Falleen gangster and leader. Black Sun agent. Dark Prince of the Black Sun crime syndicate. Fortifies his personal defenses with information gathered by his agents.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When in battle at a site, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and total ability of 6 or more required for opponent to draw battle destiny here. Immune to attrition < 5 when Vader not here.',
